Best Quality 200 Series Stainless Steel Sheet

Shanxi Steel is a leading manufacturer and supplier of 200 series stainless steel sheets, offering exceptional quality, durability, and versatility for various industrial and commercial applications.

Why Shanxi Steel 200 Series Stainless Steel?

The 200 series stainless steel offers an excellent balance of cost-effectiveness and performance. With reduced nickel content compared to 300 series, it provides substantial cost savings while maintaining good corrosion resistance and mechanical properties. This makes it ideal for a wide range of applications including kitchenware, architectural decoration, automotive components, and industrial equipment. The 200 series is known for its excellent formability, making it easy to fabricate into complex shapes, and its good weldability ensures strong, reliable joints in welded assemblies.

200 Series Stainless Steel Specification

GradeStandardDescription
201ASTM A240High strength, good corrosion resistance, suitable for kitchenware, architectural decoration, etc.
202ASTM A240Similar to 201, slightly higher nickel content, better corrosion resistance, used in similar applications.
204CuASTM A240Excellent formability and weldability, good corrosion resistance, ideal for deep drawing applications.
205ASTM A240High strength, good ductility, suitable for structural components and automotive parts.

200 Series Stainless Steel Uses

Commercial Kitchen Counters

Durable and hygienic stainless steel counters for commercial kitchens

Chemical Processing Tanks

Corrosion-resistant tanks for chemical processing applications

Bulk Food Storage Containers

Food-grade containers for bulk storage in food processing facilities

Automotive Trims

High-quality trim components for automotive applications

Architectural Cladding

Modern architectural cladding for building exteriors

Hospital Surgical Equipment

Medical-grade stainless steel for surgical instruments and equipment

Railway Coaches Interior Panels

Durable interior panels for railway coach applications

Electronic Enclosures

Protective enclosures for electronic equipment

Conveyor Belts in Food Processing

Hygienic conveyor systems for food processing industries

Advantages of 200 Series Stainless Steel Sheet

Cost-Effectiveness

Offers a more economical alternative to other stainless steel grades without compromising on quality.

High Strength

Possesses excellent tensile strength and hardness, ensuring durability and longevity.

Aesthetic Appeal

Provides a bright, attractive finish that enhances the visual appeal of products and structures.

Superior Formability and Weldability

The 200 Series stands out for its exceptional formability, allowing manufacturers to create complex shapes and designs with ease. This reduces production time and costs while maintaining structural integrity.

Its outstanding weldability makes it ideal for applications requiring welded assemblies, with minimal distortion and excellent joint strength.

Eco-Friendly Manufacturing

Our commitment to sustainability means the 200 Series is produced using environmentally responsible processes. Reduced energy consumption and minimal waste generation contribute to a greener future.

Fully recyclable material ensures that 200 Series products can be reused indefinitely without degradation of properties.

Tailored Solutions

We offer customized solutions for specific dimensions, finishes, and grades to meet your exact requirements.

Common Products

201 Stainless Steel Sheet

High strength, good corrosion resistance, suitable for kitchenware, architectural decoration, etc.

202 Stainless Steel Sheet

Similar to 201, slightly higher nickel content, better corrosion resistance, used in similar applications.

204Cu Austenitic Stainless Steel

Excellent formability and weldability, good corrosion resistance, ideal for deep drawing applications.

205 Stainless Steel Sheet

High strength, good ductility, suitable for structural components and automotive parts.

201N Stainless Steel Sheet

Enhanced nitrogen content for increased strength and corrosion resistance, suitable for structural applications.
